ValidationRule.description: Makes Who did we lose to? Required when an opportunity is saved with "Lost" or "No Decision"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'Sales Admin')), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'MMS Sales ZSA - SB')), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'MMS Sales DSA - SB')), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(Who_did_we_lose_to__c,""), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MMSOpportunityRecordType', RecordType.DeveloperName='CoreOpportunityRecordType', RecordType.DeveloperName='Prism_PEO_Opportunity_Record_Type', RecordType.DeveloperName='PEO_Opportunity_Record_Type', RecordType.DeveloperName='Virtual_Sales'
), OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName ,"Lost"),ISPICKVAL(StageName ,"No Decision")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Who did we lose to? is required when the opportunity is Lost, No Decision or Disqualified.
